Package xxl.connectivity.jama

This package contains classes that are using the Jama library.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RoussopoulosChenQFSEstimator.ModelFunction Interface representing model functions used for the estimation.
 

Class Summary
Jamas This class provides some useful static methods for dealing with matrices provided in the (JAMA Package.
KoenigWeikumQFSEstimator This class provides methods to estimate the selectivity of a simple range query which is represented by an array of doubles(left side closed, right side open).The domain of the values is divided into a specified number of intervals("buckets") and within each bucket, a linear spline is used to approximate the density of the values.The queries and their true selectivities are recorded and used to adjust the variables of each bucket to improve the estimation for frequently queried intervals.
RoussopoulosChenQFSEstimator This class provides a selectivity estimator for range queries based upon [RC94]: Chen, Chungmin Melvin Chen.
RoussopoulosChenQFSEstimator.Monom Objects of this class implementing monoms in a mathematical sense.
SVDProjection This class provides a singular value decomposition in the sense of dimension reduction for real-valued high-dimensional spaces.
 

Package xxl.connectivity.jama Description

This package contains classes that are using the Jama library. This includes Matrix operations, projection in combination with the singular value decomposition and adaptive techniques for selectivity estimation using query feedback.
